meanings.definition: The quality or state of being odd.
meanings.sent1: The oddness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but notice the oddness of her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The oddness of the clown's shoes made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her oddness in choosing mismatched socks was like a rainbow in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The oddness of the cat wearing a hat stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: An odd or strange quality or characteristic.
meanings.sent1: The oddness of the old house gave it a mysterious vibe.
meanings.sent2: His oddness in collecting rubber ducks was well-known among his friends.
meanings.sent3: The oddness of the talking parrot entertained the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: The oddness of the glowing mushrooms in the forest was like a scene from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The oddness of the clock ticking backward was both eerie and fascinating.
